title: Twisted treeline full time reinstatement
body: I've been playing TT as much as i can once it comes out on rotation, and thought it might a good time to bring up the argument, as to whether or not TT should be reinstated. Its been a long time since we got the oce server (5 years) and we were told that we wouldn't get TT as a full time fixture for a while. It has been a while and the server seems to have grown quite a bit, maybe its time we finally got TT as a full time gamemode, instead of set times at certain times of the week

replies.body: I believe it should be up more often at the least, I can see the problems with having it up all the time, but not everyone can play at the times TT is active and this can make it quite difficult to progress in ranked or to enjoy the mode.

Im not sure it could be sustained all year round - but towards the end of the season I do think it should be more available. Last year and this year there are rewards for reaching gold in 3v3 yet there is barely any window to play giving an opportunity to climb.

The ranked window _has_ been doubled for the end of the season.

>**Twisted Treeline Ranked Flex:**
Thursday^^: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
Friday^^: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
Saturday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
Sunday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT

>^^ additional days running up until end of season on Nov 12, 2018
Riot should advertise this! It's hard to know when TT is up.

On boards there's usually a bit of fanfare on the Queue Schedule post (which also remains pinned), but I agree it would be nice to have more visibility. I don't play it all that much myself, and I know we can't support full time TT as a region, but I'm sure there are a few more casual TT players who just forget when it's up.

There is a little popup when you login and it's up, but players and popups don't mix.

As much as this sounds promising, this is the OCE server, we don't have the player base for this.

Of course you could go back to "But I play this a lot, and so do a lot of other people that I know", but what about the other 199,500 people who most likely don't play the gamemode.

The schedule is fine, but if TT could see more time, that would be best.

Whilst we can't ever keep it to the point of 24x7 queues, the main issue is that the queue can be sustained with increased times if they just made some QOL changes to make it worthwhile and it's just frustrating that Riot doesn't appear to want to put effort into it.

Yeah I get what you mean.

But honestly, as long as it doesn't end up as crystal scar, I'm happy.
